author: LeftOfCenter
title: House Benghazi Committee Will Dunk Hillary In Water To See If She Floats
text:
Me Myself • 31 sec ago 
"But I see WAY too many Bernie supporters who sound like Teabaggers screaming for "complete ideological purity or nothing" 
Nonsense, stop saying this is about ideological purity. Would be the case if the country wasn't a train wreck. George "Kingfish" Stevens • 31 sec ago 
Good Riddance Debbie Water Dog - Schvantz ! Granite Skyline • 40 sec ago 
DWS is a real, let's say, take-charge kind of person. That was great a few ago when quite a few wayward Dems needed to be kicked in the ass and told to conform. But now, she is the exact opposite of what the DNC needs. posted on Republicans Are An Ungovernable Mess, So Media Shouts 'Both Sides!' Turk • 52 sec ago 
Do the Koch brothers have vile, evil offspring to follow in their footsteps like George H. W. Bush , Dick Cheney Billy Graham and Mike Huckabee do? posted on Charles Koch Stops By Megyn Kelly's Show To Lie About His Political Activity Truth_Critic • 1 min ago 
I would like to see a round table debate by the women who support Sanders and the men who support Clinton. 
Then compare it to a debate between Sander's male supporters and Clinton's male supporters, as well as Clinton's female and Sander's female supporters... as well as the trans-gender supporters accordingly. 
Aside from the gender relationship(s) and human emotions, the additional information acquired would be interesting... to me anyways.
